üì∑ Jane Jake

Meet one of the teams behind Stryker's vibrant culture: our Instrument Division's Engagement Team! This dynamic group is at the forefront of cultivating engagement and excitement for employees and customers designed to propel our business forward.

Their mission? To bolster employee engagement across the board - whether it's in their own building, spanning the region or reaching out to remote team members. They're the brains behind our Customer Experience Center labs and play a pivotal role in energizing the North American Sales Meetings.

But it doesn't stop there. The Engagement Team knows the importance of connection and camaraderie, hosting happy hours, networking events, Bring Your Family to Work Day, and more. Through their relentless efforts, they're not just improving our culture; they're making Stryker an even more fun, vibrant place to work.

A round of applause for the Engagement Team ‚Äì truly making a difference at Stryker and setting the bar high for workplace culture! 

Interested in joining our team? View all open jobs:  https://ow.ly/tF3P50RluI1

#StrykerCulture #TeamSpotlight #EmployeeEngagement
